channel.title: Lip Sync Issue In Office Complex
channel.description: I got to the point where if you have a security guard and scientist with you, they react to the elevator shaft you have to jump. When I turned around when the security guard was talking after I made the jump, his lips didn't move. They continued to not move when he pointed out the scientist dangling from above.
